General.Name: China Railway Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: China Railway Materials Company Limited provides material supply chain management services for rail transit industry primarily in China. It offers supply chain integration services for railway diesel and lubricating oils; rail operation and maintenance services, such as procurement, production coordination, quality supervision, transportation organization, and welding processing; and railway equipment comprising wheels, axles, bearings, couplers, buffers, braking devices and other key running parts, as well as H-shaped and B-shaped steel products, bamboo flooring, high-speed rail glasses, and other vehicle materials. The company also engages in the provision of centralized procurement service for railway construction materials, bidding agency services, and railway engineering material supply services. It offers clinkers, finished cement and commercial concrete products, sleepers, elastic support blocks, and other products for use in construction of railways, roads, bridges, tunnels, and buildings; and engineering construction materials and bulk material supply chain integration services. The company was founded in 1887 and is based in Beijing, China.
